title: Looking for Baltimore T206's w/ Cycle backs

posts.post_title: Looking for Baltimore T206's w/ Cycle backs
posts.post_content:
I'm looking form most Baltimore players with a Cycle back in any condition.  Specifically ,the players are:

- Adkins
- [STRIKE]Cassidy[/STRIKE] FOUND ONE!
- Dessau
- [STRIKE]Dunn[/STRIKE] FOUND ONE
- Jackson (could use him in an EPDG too)

Thanks!

It's been three months so I thought I'd bump this.  Anyone have Adkins, Dessau or Jackson with a Cycle back?

Thanks!
